isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - TRANSFER CASES - SERVICE PROCEDURES - END YOKES AND FLANGES

svcproc.title: END YOKES AND FLANGES

caution.para: Hammering on end yokes or flanges to remove or install them is not only destructive to the yoke or flange itself, but can also cause serious internal damage. Hammering on end yokes can close in the bearing bores or misalign yoke lugs and result in early failures of journal needle bearings or other driveline components.

svcproc.para: In most designs, when the yoke/flange locknuts are tightened and secure, the internal bearings and gears are in proper location.
